features.name: Authentication (Signup/Login, Session, Protected Routes)
features.description: User signup/login via Supabase Auth, session context, protected routes with middleware, auth modal UI.

features.name: Chat Sessions UI
features.description: Chat interface with session-based routing, message input, model selector, and response rendering.

features.name: Chat API Route
features.description: Edge/server route handling chat requests to AI providers using OpenAI/OpenRouter.

features.name: Chat History
features.description: History page to list prior chat sessions and navigate to them.

features.name: Database Integration (Supabase)
features.description: Supabase Postgres schema for users, chat sessions, and messages with migrations.

features.name: App Shell and Styles
features.description: Global layout, styling, and static assets.
